name: Piston2Jet
about: Piston2Jet is a veteran-owned flight school and aviation solutions company based at the Manassas Regional Airport in Virginia. With over 120 years of combined aviation experience and more than 35,000 hours of flight time, our instructors are highly qualified and dedicated professionals. Our mission is built on respect, integrity, and responsibility, ensuring a safe and efficient training experience. We offer a range of programs from Private Pilot to Airline Transport Pilot, as well as specialized courses like Test Pilot Training and Garmin G1000 familiarization. Our fleet includes meticulously maintained aircraft such as the Diamond DA-40XL and Piper Arrow. At Piston2Jet, we are committed to your success and safety in aviation.
